member.name: T:Openize.Heic.Decoder.AuxiliaryReferenceType
member.summary: Type of auxiliary reference layer.

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.AuxiliaryReferenceType.Alpha
member.summary: Transparency layer. Defined as "urn:mpeg:hevc:2015:auxid:1".

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.AuxiliaryReferenceType.DepthMap
member.summary: Depth map layer. Defined as "urn:mpeg:hevc:2015:auxid:2".

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.AuxiliaryReferenceType.HdrGainMap
member.summary: High dynamic range layer. Defined as "urn:com:apple:photo:2020:aux:hdrgainmap".

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.AuxiliaryReferenceType.PortraitEffectsMatte
member.summary: Layer that represents the portrait effects matte of the image. Defined as "urn:com:apple:photo:2018:aux:portraiteffectsmatte".

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.AuxiliaryReferenceType.SemanticHairMatte
member.summary: Layer that represents the semantic segmentation hair matte of the image. Defined as "urn:com:apple:photo:2019:aux:semantichairmatte".

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.AuxiliaryReferenceType.SemanticSkinMatte
member.summary: Layer that represents the semantic segmentation skin matte of the image. Defined as "urn:com:apple:photo:2019:aux:semanticskinmatte".

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.AuxiliaryReferenceType.SemanticTeethMatte
member.summary: Layer that represents the semantic segmentation teeth matte of the image. Defined as "urn:com:apple:photo:2019:aux:semanticteethmatte".

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.AuxiliaryReferenceType.SemanticGlassesMatte
member.summary: Layer that represents the semantic segmentation glasses matte of the image. Defined as "urn:com:apple:photo:2020:aux:semanticglassesmatte".

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.AuxiliaryReferenceType.SemanticSkyMatte
member.summary: Layer that represents the semantic segmentation sky matte of the image. Defined as "urn:com:apple:photo:2020:aux:semanticskymatte".

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.AuxiliaryReferenceType.LinearThumbnail
member.summary: Defined as "tag:apple.com,2023:photo:aux:linearthumbnail".

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.AuxiliaryReferenceType.StyleDeltaMap
member.summary: Defined as "tag:apple.com,2023:photo:aux:styledeltamap".

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.AuxiliaryReferenceType.Undefined
member.summary: Undefined layer.

member.name: T:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame
member.summary: Heic image frame class. Contains hevc coded data or meta data.

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.hvcConfig
member.summary: Hevc decoder configuration information from Isobmff container.

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.rawPixels
member.summary: Raw YUV pixel data, used when bit depth is less or equal 8. Multidimantional array: chroma or luma index, then two-dimentional array with x and y navigation.

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.rawPixelsHighColorRange
member.summary: Raw YUV pixel data, used when bit depth is greater than 8. Multidimantional array: chroma or luma index, then two-dimentional array with x and y navigation.

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.pasp
member.summary: Contains the pixel aspect ratio information. This is an unused field that is created for debugging.

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.colr
member.summary: Contains colour information. This is an unused field that is created for debugging.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.ID
member.summary: The unique identifier of the image frame.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.ImageType
member.summary: Type of an image frame content.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.Width
member.summary: Width of the image frame in pixels.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.Height
member.summary: Height of the image frame in pixels.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.HasAlpha
member.summary: Indicates the presence of transparency of transparency layer.
member.returns: True if frame is linked with alpha data frame, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.IsHidden
member.summary: Indicates the fact that frame is marked as hidden.
member.returns: True if frame is hidden, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.IsImage
member.summary: Indicates the fact that frame contains image data.
member.returns: True if frame is image, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.IsDerived
member.summary: Indicates the fact that frame contains image transform data and is inherited from another frame(-s).
member.returns: True if frame is derived, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.DerivativeType
member.summary: Indicates the type of derivative content if the frame is derived.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.AuxiliaryReferenceType
member.summary: Indicates the type of auxiliary reference layer if the frame type is auxiliary.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.NumberOfChannels
member.summary: Number of channels with color data.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.BitsPerChannel
member.summary: Bits per channel with color data.

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.Exif
member.summary: Exchangeable image frame metadata.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.alphaReference
member.summary: Identificator of the layer with alpha data.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.imageRotationAngle
member.summary:
Image rotation angle data in anti-clockwise direction in units of 90 degrees.
To get the degree units this value has to be multiplied by 90.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.imageMirrorAxis
member.summary: Specifies a vertical (axis = 1) or horizontal (axis = 2) axis for the mirroring operation.

member.name: M:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.#ctor(Openize.Heic.Decoder.IO.BitStreamWithNalSupport,Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImage,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Create Heic image frame object.

member.name: M:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.GetByteArray(Openize.Heic.Decoder.PixelFormat,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary:
Get pixel data in the format of byte array.
Each three or four bytes (the count depends on the pixel format) refer to one pixel left to right top to bottom line by line.
member.param: Pixel format that defines the order of colors and the presence of alpha byte.
member.returns: Byte array, null if frame does not contain image data.

member.name: M:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.GetInt32Array(Openize.Heic.Decoder.PixelFormat,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary:
Get pixel data in the format of integer array.
Each int value refers to one pixel left to right top to bottom line by line.
member.param: Pixel format that defines the order of colors.
member.returns: Integer array, null if frame does not contain image data.

member.name: M:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.GetTextData
member.summary:
Get frame text data.
Exists only for mime frame types.

member.name: M:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImageFrame.AddLayerReference(System.UInt32,Openize.Heic.Decoder.AuxiliaryReferenceType)
member.summary: Add layer reference to the frame. Used to link reference layers that are reverce-linked (alpha layer, depth map, hdr).

member.summary: Load frame properties from Box and stream.

member.summary: Returns a string representation of the object.

member.summary: Image Grid. Reconstructing a grid of input images of the same width and height.

member.summary: Exif metadata. Exchangeable image file format metadata.

member.summary: The BitStreamWithNalSupport class is designed to read bits from a specified stream. It allows to ignore specified byte sequences while reading.

member.summary: Context-adaptive arithmetic entropy-decoder.

member.summary: Creates a class object with a stream object and an optional buffer size as parameters.

member.summary: Returns the current image context.

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.IO.BitStreamWithNalSupport.CurrentImageId
member.summary: Current image identificator.

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.IO.BitStreamWithNalSupport.ContextDictionary
member.summary: Dictionary of images context information.

member.summary: Creates an image context object.

member.summary: Deletes the image context object by id.

member.summary: Nal Unit reader mode.

member.summary: Previous read byte.

member.summary: The byte read before previous.

member.summary: Turns on Nal Unit reader mode which ignores specified by standart byte sequences.

member.summary: Turns off Nal Unit reader mode.

member.name: M:Openize.Heic.Decoder.IO.BitStreamWithNalSupport.Read(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads the specified number of bits from the stream.
member.param: The required number of bits to read.

member.name: M:Openize.Heic.Decoder.IO.BitStreamWithNalSupport.ReadString
member.summary: Reads bytes as ASCII characters until '\0'.

member.name: M:Openize.Heic.Decoder.IO.BitStreamWithNalSupport.ReadFlag
member.summary: Reads one bit and returns true if it is 1, otherwise false.

member.summary: Skip the specified number of bits in the stream.

member.summary: Read an unsigned integer 0-th order Exp-Golomb-coded syntax element with the left bit first.

member.name: M:Openize.Heic.Decoder.IO.BitStreamWithNalSupport.ReadSev
member.summary: Read a signed integer 0-th order Exp-Golomb-coded syntax element with the left bit first.

member.summary: Dictionary of public Heic image frames with access by identifier.

member.summary: Width of the default image frame in pixels.

member.summary: Height of the default image frame in pixels.

member.summary: Exchangeable image metadata of the default image frame.

member.name: M:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImage.Load(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary:
Reads the file meta data and creates a class object for further decoding of the file contents.
This operation does not decode pixels. Use the default frame methods GetByteArray or GetInt32Array afterwards in order to decode pixels.
member.returns: Returns a heic image object with meta data read.

member.name: M:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImage.CanLoad(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Checks if the stream can be read as a heic image.
member.returns: True if file header contains heic signarure, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImage.GetByteArray(Openize.Heic.Decoder.PixelFormat,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary:
Get pixel data of the default image frame in the format of byte array.
Each three or four bytes (the count depends on the pixel format) refer to one pixel left to right top to bottom line by line.
member.param: Pixel format that defines the order of colors and the presence of alpha byte.
member.returns: Byte array, null if frame does not contain image data.

member.name: M:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImage.GetInt32Array(Openize.Heic.Decoder.PixelFormat,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary:
Get pixel data of the default image frame in the format of integer array.
Each int value refers to one pixel left to right top to bottom line by line.
member.param: Pixel format that defines the order of colors.
member.returns: Integer array, null if frame does not contain image data.

member.name: M:Openize.Heic.Decoder.HeicImage.ReadFramesMeta(Openize.Heic.Decoder.IO.BitStreamWithNalSupport)
member.summary: Fill frames dictionary with read meta data.

member.summary: 2 if 420 or 422, otherwise 1

member.name: P:Openize.Heic.Decoder.seq_parameter_set_rbsp.SubHeightC
member.summary: 2 if 420, otherwise 1

member.name: T:Openize.Heic.Decoder.PixelFormat
member.summary: Specifies the format of the color data for each pixel in the image.

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.PixelFormat.Rgb24
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 24 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the red, green, and blue components.

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.PixelFormat.Rgba32
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 32 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the red, green, blue, and alpha components.

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.PixelFormat.Argb32
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 32 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the alpha, red, green, and blue components.

member.name: F:Openize.Heic.Decoder.PixelFormat.Bgra32
member.summary: Specifies that the format is 32 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the blue, green, red, and alpha components.
